relationships.description: Sirius summoned Kreacher, but it did not answer.
George and Ginny hugged their mother.
Ron downed the rest of his butterbeer.
Sirius loudly and joyfully jumped to his feet, initiating breakfast.
Harry hurried over to help with plates.
